# Shadow, Improved (Arm/ShldSpcAb)
## Overview
As *[[Shadow (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|shadow]]*, except it grants a +10 competence bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] checks.

Moderate illusion; CL 10th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Invisibility (Spell)|invisibility]]**,* *[[Silence (Spell)|silence]]**;* Price +15,000 gp.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 464
